# Getting started

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(broom)
library(corrr)
library(performance)
library(betareg)

input_filename <- 'spotify_songs.csv'
## data_path <- file.path('..','5 data')
data_path <- '.'
input_path <- file.path(data_path, input_filename)

songs <- read_csv(input_path)
glimpse(songs)
```
